name: Unforgiven
description:
My work blends everyday occurrences from my life in Brooklyn with abstracted nightmares and crude humor. Trained as an illustrator, I tries to tell a story with every piece I make, developing a personal and slightly sinister narrative within each painting. Using candy colors, heavy patterning, and tight compositions, the work draws inspiration from American folk art, the cartoons I watched as a kid, and my appreciation for architecture. I am always striving to make work that is highly personal but altered enough to allow individual interpretations to be applied to every story I paints.
Size : 1338  × 1600 px
Date : 2018
